programme.title: A Leopard's Legacy
programme.desc: A confident and powerful leopardess named Olimba, rules over an exceptionally large area along Zambia‚Äôs Luangwa river. She is a formidable hunter, a courageous ruler, and a devoted mother. She‚Äôs just given birth to two tiny cubs, and as she faces the challenging task of motherhood, it‚Äôs a constant battle to hunt successfully, to defend her prime territory, and to protect her cubs against her enemies.

programme.title: Born Wild
programme.desc: Our cast of characters and their parents learn just what it takes to survive and thrive in an ever changing world.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters
programme.desc: Two big male lions, twin brothers with a powerful bond, have ruled the Nsefu Pride for three years - they're fathers to all the young, and protectors of their territory.

programme.title: The Real Black Panther
programme.desc: There's a new challenger in the Kabini Forest of India, one unlike all leopards that came before him. This is the story of Saya, the real black panther, and his rise to power..

programme.title: A Leopard's Legacy

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: On the edge of the Sahara Desert in Mali, a society struggles to thrive. This isn't a society of humans but of rare desert elephants. More than just a herd of animals, they are a tribe of extended families and comrades with their own unique culture.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: June must deal with orphaned pup, Vince, as he tries to join her burrow. Over in the Highlands, Scarlett's fearless pups go in search of two badgers, a choice with deadly consequences.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: The Prairie Dogs of northern New Mexico deal with all kinds of threats, big and small. In the Flatlands, June faces an infestation of fleas.

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: Who says everything happens on the ground? And who says you need wings to fly? Welcome to the canopy of the Borneo rainforest, where the best action is high in the air, swinging from branches and leaping through the treetops. Animals here do everything without ever touching the ground.

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: Life is risky, and no stage of life is riskier than the very beginning. Most animals are born frail, vulnerable, and with a lot of learning to do. But life doesn't go easy on the newcomers..

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: From the deepest seas to the tallest mountains, animals continuously surprise us and prove yet again that when it comes to Mother Nature, there is always an exception to the rule. These animals go against the grain, whether cheating death or forming odd friendships- it's Animals Gone Wild: Surprisingly Human. .

programme.title: Wild India
programme.desc: India's monsoon forest is a place of both sanctuary and extremes. From the dry season drought to the monsoon deluge, all must live by the law of the seasons. Whether migrating, raising young or defending against predators, every day is a quest for survival. As the dry season tightens its grip, only the most ingenious and resourceful will endure until the lifesaving rains return.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: When you take an animals natural instincts and add a trick up its sleeve, the outcome is anything but ordinary. From unruly intruders and escape artists to hot-headed security guards and just plain bad manners, rogues are on the run. These instigators follow their own rules and make no apologies in Animals Gone Wild: Ambushed.

programme.title: Wild India
programme.desc: From the towering peaks of the Himalayas to the rainforests of the Western Ghats, life is a daily battle in India‚Äôs mountains. These ranges provide a vital refuge for some of the country‚Äôs most iconic and tenacious species. Rhino and elephant thrive here, alongside top predators and rare and exotic animals - all fighting to survive in India‚Äôs unforgiving frontiers.

programme.title: Secrets Of Wild India
programme.desc: At first glance the desert of India's north-west appear devoid of life. But even in the most hostile environments wildlife thrives. In this inhospitable place, only the best adapted survive. Here, in the harsh deserts and salty drylands, live India's specialists. They have to endure extreme hardship, sandstorms, droughts, and intense heat.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild

From unruly intruders and escape artists to hot-headed security guards and just plain bad manners, rogues are on the run. These instigators follow their own rules and make no apologies in Animals Gone Wild: Ambushed.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: These wacky and wild incidents show us just how crazy it can get out there in the animal kingdom. From the grizzly Alaskan frontier to the sweet melody of an indoor pooch, these animals never stop showing their true colors. Theyre the most amazing, confounding and disturbing encounters on Animals Gone Wild: Believe it or Not.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: How outrageous can the animal kingdom get? Whether its out-of-bounds behavior or savage instincts run amok, when animals act out, theyre a force to be reckoned with. From the mysterious depths of the deep blue sea to the jungles untamed edge, see just how rough, rowdy, and lawless Mother Natures most unruly creatures can be.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: When your number's up, it's up. Or is it? When fight or flight instincts kick in, anything is possible, and animals will do anything to survive. From heroic acts of bravery to narrow escapes and near misses, expect the unexpected when creatures big and small encounter the animal kingdom's strangest curve balls in Animals Gone Wild: Shock & Awe.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: From lumps and bumps to geckos and goats, Doc and the vets treat ‚Äòem all! A dog comes in with a large growth in his mouth needing immediate attention while Dr. Lisa tangles with a family of sassy highlander cows. Dr. Pol gives a reluctant pig his first hoof and tusk trim and treats a 200-pound great Dane that may have a failing heart.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: A Chihuahua in emergency labor has Dr. Nicole on high alert as she attempts to save the mother and puppies. The clinic reels in a curious case of a cat and a fishhook, while a preemie goat and a spooked trail horse both need care for their ailing eyes. Dr. Pol weighs in on an age-old debate: crunchy or smooth?.

programme.title: Secret Life of Predators
programme.desc: Worldwide, predators that inhabit open spaces must hide in plain sight in order to thrive. On the vast plains of the African savanna, banded mongooses rely on strength in numbers in order to succeed in a land of giants. .

programme.title: Secret Life of Predators
programme.desc: If you're a forest predator, success requires using trees to bridge the gap between life and death. In this realm, danger - or your next meal - could be behind you, below, or above you. Whether you're a Harpy eagle, zeroing in on prey from high in the rainforest canopy, a cunning weasel, scouring for a meal in and out of mossy logs, or a Bengal tiger, trying to stalk in a bare, dry forest, catching prey among the trees is a challenge.
